actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing testimony and representation of Galen Reser in the case of Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Company v. George P. Schultz, et. al., Civil Action No. 83-3819.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent a named employee in the case of Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Company v. George P. Schultz, et al. Authorizes the employee to testify and produce subpoenaed documents, except those determined privileged from disclosure, in such case.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing testimony and representation of Galen Reser in the case of Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Company v. George P. Schultz, et. al., Civil Action No. 83-3819.
